about.title: About Me
about.description: Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience in web development, specialized in creating intuitive and efficient solutions with React.js and Next.js.
about.paragraph1: My journey in programming began with a passion for creating memorable digital experiences. Over the years, I've developed expertise in various modern technologies, always focusing on delivering solutions that not only meet client needs but exceed their expectations.
about.paragraph2: I believe that web development goes beyond just writing code - it's about creating experiences that positively impact clients' businesses. My goal is to help companies achieve their objectives through innovative and efficient technological solutions.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A selection of my main projects, demonstrating expertise in modern web development.

project1.title: Hospital de Base de Rio Preto
project1.description: I developed a comprehensive web portal for Hospital de Base de Rio Preto, one of Brazil's largest healthcare institutions, which receives over 100,000 monthly visits. The portal provides extensive information for both patients and healthcare professionals and includes an integrated institutional blog. Built with Next.js and optimized for 100% SEO to maximize reach and visibility.

project2.title: Hospital da Criança e Maternidade (HCM)
project2.description: I developed a web presence for HCM (Hospital da Criança e Maternidade), a pediatric hospital dedicated to providing humane care. The website was designed with a focus on sensitivity and user-friendliness to address the delicate nature of a children's healthcare institution.

project3.title: SmartSol Task Management System
project3.description: I developed a comprehensive task management system with a Kanban-style interface. This project was built entirely using Next.js for the frontend and backend, leveraging PostgreSQL for the database and deployed on Vercel for scalability and reliability.
